page.title: 17HOBBIES AND INTERESTS
page.content: The current crazes for 1985 are B.M.X. bikes,computers and board games.The most popular computers are the B.B.C., Commodore,Spectrum,Dragon and Vic 20. Most of the children play games on them from a huge variety.Pocket computer games are also popular.The B.M.X. craze is increasing rapidly,with a variety of tricks like Bunny hops and Wheelies you can do.Safety padding should be worn, but few do. The bikes,like the Raleigh Burner are not really suitable for the road,and children are always looking for suitable places for tracks. The "hit" board game this year is called "Trivial Pursuit" - a general knowledge game with questions of no particular importance.
